column2: Silat Melayu

The Schools of Silat in Malaysia are a proud group of martial masters who regularly participate in sparring matches with the oversight of their masters. A tradition carried on for untold generations there are many legends regarding some of the greatest masters of the arts that have graced the annals of history.

Spar
Members of a Martial Arts School can spar other members and enemies.
Complete a Training Regimen
Disciples must be in prime condition in order to spar, so they must complete a training regimen put forth by the Grandmaster.
Martial Stances
Martial Stances have been part of the sparring tradition since time immemorial. Choosing one of the archetypes, rival and nameless master, is a step in becoming a true master.
Choose a Martial Arts Style
As a master, special moves are critical to performance within the ring. And so, it's necessary for a master to choose which of the styles they wish to focus on.
Renown
Spar for Honor
Members of Martial Art Schools often spar one another, for practice and recreation. It is not a duty one neglects without the notice of one's peers...
Complete Training Regimen
Disciples must be in prime condition in order to spar, so they can complete a training regimen put forth by the Grandmaster.
Choose a Martial Stances
Martial Stances have been part of the sparring tradition since time immemorial. Choosing one of the archetypes, rival and nameless master, is a step in becoming a true master.

Spar
Challenge [This.GetTitledFirstName] to a sparring match to uphold your honor. Matches can be considered dangerous to your health.
Sparer have NOT recently been in any match\n
Has NOT recently refused a challenge (Expires: [This.has_recently_declined_duel_cooldown.GetExpiryDate])
Complete a Training Regimen

As a member of Martial Art Schools, you need to be in peak physical performance to hold your own in the ring. The Grandmaster of Martial Art Schools has devised a training regimen so members can keep their bodies in shape.
You have not trained for two years.
Choose a Martial Arts Persona
Martial Art Persona have been part of the sparring tradition since time immemorial. Choosing one of the archetypes, rival and nameless master, is a step in becoming a true master.
Choose a Martial Arts Style
As a master, special moves are critical to performance within the ring. And so, it's necessary for a master to choose which of the styles they wish to focus on.

[combatant_1.GetFirstNameWithNick], a [combatant_1.GetSocietyRank] in my lodge, is [combatant_1.GetNegativeDuelSkillTerm] sparr at best. It is shameful for someone like [combatant_1.GetHerHim] to be so woefully unready should [Root.Society.GetName] call upon [combatant_1.GetHerHis] aid! Perhaps I should encourage [combatant_1.GetHerHim] to spar with another member?

[combatant_1.GetFirstNameWithNick] managed to best [combatant_2.GetFirstNameWithNick] handily after a short match. A cheering crowd heaved [combatant_1.GetFirstName] up on their shoulders after the victory, hoisting [combatant_1.GetHerHim] over to the lodge to celebrate. [combatant_1.GetSheHeCap] will become a renowned sparr yet...
A fellow member of [Root.Society.GetName], §Y[lodge_member_killed.GetFirstNameWithNick]§!, has been killed in a match by §Y[lodge_member_killer.GetFirstNameWithNick]§!!

Upon returning from a local bout, I have been talking to [student.GetBestName]. The [student.GetManWoman] does not understand the urge for adrenaline, whatsoever. "What about the fame it brings your family?", I argue, recounting the swarms of admirers I had to fight through to get here. [student.GetSheHeCap] sighs, seemingly unimpressed.

Observing yet another game of [Root.GetWarriorLodgeCompetitionType], and [student.GetTitledFirstName] storming off with a sullen expression on [student.GetHerHis] face, it occurs to me how my [student.GetRootRelation] sorely lacks patience. "It is useful in ring as well", I mumble, scratching my chin, contemplating offering [student.GetHerHim] some guidance.

Watching [student.GetBestName] in the training grounds is always interesting. There is something about [student.GetHerHis] fighting technique that comes off as half-hearted, and [student.GetHerHis] cape, as well as the mask, seem like they could use a little more caring for... "[student.GetFirstName], could I have a word?", I interrupt the sparring.
As a sparr, [student.GetSheHe] needs me.
Let's talk costume care and etiquette, my good [student.GetManWoman].

I hear you are turning down matches, a [teacher.GetManWoman] sounds behind me. Spinning around, I find myself talking to my [teacher.GetRootRelation], [teacher.GetTitledFirstName]. "[Root.Society.GetNameCap] are aware, of course", [teacher.GetSheHe] says. Putting an arm over my shoulder, [teacher.GetSheHe] continues: "I could help you! You just need a little guidance, my good [Root.GetManWoman]!"

[teacher.GetTitledFirstName] has returned from a local bout. My [teacher.GetRootRelation] is regaling me with tales of [teacher.GetHerHis] fame, when I let out a sigh, causing [teacher.GetHerHim] to pause. "You know, you always seem so content with what you have, [Root.GetFirstName]" [teacher.GetSheHe] says. "I could help you hone your ambition", [teacher.GetSheHe] presses.

[teacher.GetBestName] is watching me in the training grounds. There is something inquisitive about it, and I am not surprised when [teacher.GetSheHe] comes over, asking about the routines I keep, "maintenance-wise, for your costume". When I fail to come up with a clear answer, [teacher.GetSheHe] continues, unapologetically: "I could teach you how to care for your mask".

we are going to be educating ourselves on famous [Root.Culture.GetName] sparer, and their historical achievements. Surely, their tales are bound to inspire the [student.GetAgeAdjective] [student.GetManWoman].
I have asked my quartermaster to let us spend some afternoons organizing the costume room. I admit, this year's spring cleaning is overdue anyway!
duster

When [teacher.GetTitledFirstName] said we were going to spend several days in a library, my heart sank. "The scribes know details about all the famous sparer" [teacher.GetSheHe] beamed. Thankfully, it only takes a few hours before I find myself enthralled by the stories. "I knew you had it in you", [teacher.GetSheHe] says cheerfully.

When my [teacher.GetRootRelation] suggested we spend a few afternoons reorganizing [teacher.GetHerHis] costume room, I expected to be bored within moments. Yet [teacher.GetTitledFirstName] has managed to keep my interest for several days, and I find myself asking questions I have never even thought of before. I am almost embarrassed by my former attitude.

You want us to spend time, voluntarily, in the library? [teacher.GetTitledFirstName] nods. "Yes! I think you'll enjoy hearing about old sparer," [teacher.GetSheHe] laughs, [teacher.GetHerHis] eyes aglitter. A few hours later, I understand. The tales are fascinating! "Some make for decent role models", I admit.

Surely, your costume room must already be in order? I offer, but [teacher.GetTitledFirstName] shakes [teacher.GetHerHis] head. "This is more about mastering the principles behind the organizing, than the organizing itself" the [teacher.GetManWoman] explains. A few days later, I admit, I have learned some valuable techniques and practices...!

[teacher.GetTitledFirstName] put me to cleaning [teacher.GetHerHis] costume room. And everything I did was wrong...! The [teacher.GetManWoman] kept giving me counter-effective instructions and muttering under [teacher.GetHerHis] breath about "impossible", and "why do I even try". If there was a lesson in this, I do not think I understood it.
My [student.GetRootRelation] and I are finally done organizing my costume room. [teacher.GetTeachingMomentResult]

Hail, [Root.GetSocietyRank]! 

As members of [Root.Society.GetName] we strive to better ourselves and each other! One way is the occasional sparring match, for practice and honor.
Seek out and spar the [duel_target.GetSocietyRank] [duel_target.GetFirstName] – you will find [duel_target.GetHerHim] in [duel_target.Location.GetName].

Signed, [From.GetTitledFirstName]

Hail, [Root.GetSocietyRank]! 

[Root.Society.GetNameCap] have been watching you, and I believe it is time for us to meet in the ring. A [duel_target.GetSocietyRank] cannot afford to get rusty! What say you? Will you seek me out for an honorable match?
I will be waiting for you in [duel_target.Location.GetName].

Signed, [From.GetTitledFirstName]
[combatant_1.GetBestName] has challenged you to a [combatant_1.GetDuelType]. The only respectable response would be to accept the challenge.

My [hero_character.GetSisterBrother] in [Root.Society.GetName], [hero_character.GetTitledName], informs me that [combatant_1.GetBestName] needs someone to partake in a [combatant_1.GetDuelType], in an attempt for the eager recruit to prove [combatant_1.GetHerselfHimself] to us. The only respectable response would be to agree to help out.
[From.GetBestName] has chosen to accept your challenge to a sparring match. The match will take place in the next few days.

[hero_character.GetBestName] and [From.Society.GetName] have chosen [From.GetTitledName] as my opponent. The [From.GetAgeAdjective] [From.GetManWoman] eyes me up and down when we are introduced. "Fresh meat, eh?" [From.GetSheHe] offers mockingly, before shoving an elbow into my side, making everyone laugh.

[hero_character.GetBestName] and [From.Society.GetName] have chosen [From.GetTitledName] as my opponent. "Is this a joke"? I ask, my [From.GetRootRelation] smiling innocently. "It is but a formality, my dear" [From.GetSheHe] shrugs. I let out a nervous laugh.

[From.GetTitledName] has volunteered as my opponent. I am uncertain what [From.GetSheHe] thinks of my lineage, and judging from the whispers surrounding us as we shake hands, so is [From.GetSheHe]... "Best of luck to you both!" [hero_character.GetBestName] says, shooting [From.GetFirstName] a reassuring glance. I let go of [From.GetManWoman]'s grip, noticing the sweat of [From.GetHerHis] hand.
A [GetDuelType], huh?
That's what I thought...
The match will take place within the next few days.\n

Not so fast, a voice whispers in my ear, as I'm preparing to turn in for the night. I turn around, but something stings my throat. A dagger? "We WILL spar, dear [Root.GetFirstName], do you understand? Nod if you understand." Panic pounding in my chest, I nod, carefully as to not hurt myself further. "Good", the [From.GetManWoman] says, and pulls away into the dark.
You gulp, as it seems you have no choice. You will spar [From.GetTitledName]!, in a few days time.\n

While attempting to talk some sense into [combatant_2.GetTitledFirstName], in regards to [combatant_2.GetHerHim] declining my challenge, I have decided to sneak into [combatant_2.GetHerHis] [combatant_2.GetCapitalHolding]. Fidgeting with the dagger in my sleeve, I have a good feeling about this, when suddenly I hear people shouting. "Who goes there?" they demand, and I am surrounded by guards.

As the match goes on, [combatant_2.GetTitledFirstName] and I get more and more desperate with grapples and finishing moves. I finally grab him and attempt to land a final blow, but [combatant_2.GetSheHe] overpowers me and flings us out of the ring, with both of our heads landing... awkwardly on the floor.

[other_combatant.GetTitledFirstName] is moving sluggishly. Perhaps it's due to the special breakfast I had my agents prepare for [other_combatant.GetHerHim], but it is clear that the [other_combatant.GetManWoman] is not in [other_combatant.GetHerHis] best form. Before anyone catches on, I attack with full force. It feels almost too easy.

My body is cramping, as [other_combatant.GetTitledFirstName] braces for another attack. The following moments are a blur, blood suddenly everywhere, somebody shouting. "Did [Root.GetTitledFirstName] just kill [other_combatant.GetHerHim]?!"

[other_combatant.GetTitledFirstName] throws out [other_combatant.GetHerHis] moves [other_combatant.GetClumsilyElegantly]. The fight has gone on forever, and my muscles are beginning to ache. With the remainder of my strength I kill [other_combatant.GetHerHim].
My opponent seems to be getting tired, [other_combatant.GetHerHis] moves becoming slower. Strengthened by the cheers of the crowd, I kill [other_combatant.GetHerHim].

It seems like ages have passed in the ring as both [other_combatant.GetBestName] and I begin to use more and more dangerous moves. Thinking quickly, I perch myself upon the ropes and leap forward towards [other_combatant.GetHerHim], elbow in the front. [other_combatant.GetSheHeCap] doesn't last long...

[other_combatant.GetBestName] and I are starting to grab without any plan, wildly flailing on the floor of the ring as we both attempt to pin each other. I finally get out of [other_combatant.GetHerHis] grip and quickly punch [other_combatant.GetHerHim] in the throat. I watch in awe as they collapse instantly.

[other_combatant.GetBestName] is quickly becoming an equal in my mind as my unrelenting fury of blows seemingly do not land. However, I spot a hole in [other_combatant.GetHerHis] defense, and I land a series of hard blows against [other_combatant.GetHerHis] body. I step back when I realize that blood is seeping out of [other_combatant.GetFirstName]'s mouth.

I am running out of options as [other_combatant.GetBestName] does not fall prey to my style. I decide to go all in and attempt to incapacitate [other_combatant.GetHerHim]. I extend my foot, trip my foe, and give [other_combatant.GetHerHim] a series of blows. It is not long until I realize [other_combatant.GetHerHim] stopped breathing.

My [other_combatant.GetRootRelation] seems unaware that the little wound I inflicted is what is causing [other_combatant.GetHerHis] limbs to slowly go numb... "Valiant effort!" I proclaim, watching [other_combatant.GetHerHis] sluggish movements. When [other_combatant.GetSheHe] lunges at me, I carefully step aside, letting [other_combatant.GetHerHis] subsequent collapse look like a failed attack. The poison must have reached [other_combatant.GetHerHis] heart.

I'm not sure why my [Root.GetMySpymasterName] wants to inspect my equipment prior to the duel – surely, [job_spymaster.GetHerHis] comment about poison were in jest! Later, my performance in the fight is not my greatest accomplishment, but I honestly expected my [other_combatant.GetRootRelation] to put up more resistance. I barely have a scratch!

Impressive! [other_combatant.GetTitledFirstName] splutters, on [other_combatant.GetHerHis] knees in the [Root.Capital.GetGroundDesc]. Finally, I let the anger fill me. "I had your 'solution' switched", I hiss, as I take my fist to [other_combatant.GetHerHis] throat. "I have eyes and ears everywhere", I explain to the bewildered [other_combatant.GetManWoman]. "You thought I'd let you *poison* me?"
You win the match.\n

Just as I begin to think that I am wearing my opponent down, [other_combatant.GetTitledFirstName] lunges at me, with more force than so far displayed. Sweat drips down my forehead, when suddenly, I hear someone shouting, describing the scene incredulously. [other_combatant.GetSheHeCap] has managed to [Root.GetWrestlingInjuringBlowOnMe].

The fight has been going on for some time and it's with some effort I'm still throwing out moves, [Root.GetClumsilyElegantly]. [other_combatant.GetTitledFirstName] looks tired too, but suddenly [other_combatant.GetSheHe] kills me.

Each movement of my body is becoming heavier, and I'm struggling to focus on my opponent, as the crowd cheers [other_combatant.GetHerHim] on. My vision is blurry when [other_combatant.GetSheHe] kills me.

[other_combatant.GetTitledFirstName] is moving [other_combatant.GetClumsilyElegantly], yet I can barely even muster the strength to hold myself upright. "You look tired, my [Root.GetLordLady]", [other_combatant.GetSheHe] says, stepping closer. I want to protest, but my head is swimming. Smirking, [other_combatant.GetSheHe] swings [other_combatant.GetHerHis] fist, and kills me.

Ages have seemingly passed as [other_combatant.GetTitledFirstName] and I begin to use more dangerous moves. Suddenly, [other_combatant.GetTitledFirstName] perches [other_combatant.GetHerHim]self upon the ropes of the ring, and jumps towards me. The last thing I hear are my ribs breaking.

[other_combatant.GetBestName] and I are starting to throw out any move that comes to the top of our heads. [other_combatant.GetBestName] rips [other_combatant.GetHerselfHimself] out of my grasp, and punches me in the throat. I collapse attempting to take in air with no luck.

In both speed and strength I am matching my foe [other_combatant.GetBestName]. However, I left a hole in my defense, and [other_combatant.GetBestName] quickly takes advantage in this, and lands multiple devastating blows.
You lose the match.\n

The match has gone on for what feels like hours – the initial confidence I felt has begun to wane, and my movements are getting sloppy. Then, just as my knees are about to give way under me, I [other_combatant.GetWrestlingInjuringBlow].

As the match begins, [other_combatant.GetTitledName] comes at me slowly. I offer [other_combatant.GetHerHim] my best taunting smile, and it does not take long before I have seen to [other_combatant.GetWrestlingInjuringBlow].

The onlookers are cheering for me, as I swing my fists with increasing enthusiasm. When it's over, [other_combatant.GetTitledName] is on the ground, [other_combatant.GetHerHis] face red with embarrassment. I shrug, smiling to the crowd, and at my opponent.

For a moment I am worried that [other_combatant.GetTitledFirstName] is going to fall, but [other_combatant.GetTitledFirstName] does not appear to notice my sabotage. All I need to do is land a blow in the right area and... There! The [other_combatant.GetManWoman] is spinning, clutching [other_combatant.GetHerHis] [other_combatant.GetBodyPartInjured], screaming in pain.

It's a good day for sparring!, I chuckle, stretching out all the necessary muscles. "Enough talking", my opponent growls. Soon, [other_combatant.GetTitledFirstName] is lying face down in the [Root.Capital.GetGroundDesc], as I have seen to [other_combatant.GetWrestlingInjuringBlow].

My opponent looks nervous, [other_combatant.GetHerHis] mask a little ill-fitting, and I briefly contemplate asking if [other_combatant.GetSheHe] would rather do this another day... A moment later, I snap out of it, letting the fresh morning air sharpen my senses instead. The [other_combatant.GetCharacterLook] [other_combatant.GetManWoman] is soon on the ground, groaning in pain.

The sun is beginning to set when I meet with [other_combatant.GetTitledFirstName], my body ready. After [other_combatant.GetSheHe] [other_combatant.GetClumsilyElegantly] dodges one attack, my next one lands perfectly. Frantically, the [other_combatant.GetManWoman] attempts to cover [other_combatant.GetHerHis] injured [other_combatant.GetBodyPartInjured], but I have rarely seen such a purple bruise...!

As the match goes on, I begin to recall the training in the Eagle tactics. I rip myself from [other_combatant.GetBestName]'s grasp and perch upon the ropes. Although the impact of the descent did incapacitate [other_combatant.GetBestName], it also injured me.

The match between [other_combatant.GetBestName] and I quickly turned into a grappling match, with the tide rarely turning in the midst of it. After temporarily losing my footing and receiving a blow for it, I found an opening in my opponent's defense, and ended the match soon after.

[other_combatant.GetBestName], being exceptionally defensive in the match, did not leave much room for my style to take its effects. After each of us landed multiple blows, I finally got the upper hand when I exploited one of [other_combatant.GetBestName]'s wide attack.

I am swinging my arms wildly, when suddenly, [other_combatant.GetTitledFirstName] shrieks in pain. Stopping my crazed flailing, I am stuck staring at the mess I have made. It seems I have managed to [other_combatant.GetWrestlingInjuringBlow].

A simple [combatant_1.GetDuelType] or not, [other_combatant.GetTitledFirstName] has an air of unquestioned confidence about [other_combatant.GetHerHim]. When I charge, [other_combatant.GetSheHe] snickers. At the end of it all, I am lying on the ground, after my opponent made sure to [Root.GetWrestlingInjuringBlowOnMe].
[other_combatant.GetTitledFirstName] charges at me, and has soon managed to [Root.GetWrestlingInjuringBlowOnMe]. The crowd does not seem impressed by my effort.

The onlookers are cheering for [other_combatant.GetTitledName], as [other_combatant.GetSheHe] is swinging [other_combatant.GetHerHis] fists with increasing enthusiasm. When it's over, the [other_combatant.GetManWoman] looks at me with pity.

I instructed the squire to weaken one of my opponent's body parts, but I am having trouble spotting the sabotage. "Are you making a wish?" [other_combatant.GetTitledFirstName] asks, impatiently – we have been at this for hours, and my scheming has lead nowhere. I back away, clutching my [GetBodyPartInjured]. [GetSeverityOfInjuryCap].

Don't look so glum, [other_combatant.GetTitledName] offers. [other_combatant.GetSheHeCap] has me on the ground, *again*, and I am losing any patience I ever had. "You oaf-" I begin, but I collapse from the pain. The [other_combatant.GetManWoman] has managed to [Root.GetWrestlingInjuringBlowOnMe], and the clear scent of blood has me dizzy.

I am not sure what is wrong with me, but nothing I do has any effect on [other_combatant.GetTitledFirstName]. "Come on, don't give up already!" [other_combatant.GetSheHe] commands, disgruntlement clear in [other_combatant.GetHerHis] voice. I try to rise, but I can't. My [Root.GetBodyPartInjured] hurts like it never has before. "I am just going to rest a little, here in the [Root.Capital.GetGroundDesc]", I mumble.

Pain is throbbing in my [GetBodyPartInjured], and I clench my jaw, trying not to cry. "It's not over!" I growl, but my opponent is lowering [other_combatant.GetHerHis] fists. The last rays of the evening sun envelops [other_combatant.GetHerHim], and suddenly, [other_combatant.GetSheHe] looks like a warrior sent by the heavens themselves...! In an attempt to say something about it, I pass out.

[other_combatant.GetTitledName] is swinging [other_combatant.GetHerHis] fists wildly, when suddenly, a shriek of pain cuts through the air. Staggering, I realize that the voice is my own – my opponent has managed to [Root.GetWrestlingInjuringBlowOnMe].

[other_combatant.GetBestName] and I were duking it out pretty evenly over the course of our match until [other_combatant.GetSheHe] ripped [other_combatant.GetHerselfHimself] out of my grasp. All of a sudden, [other_combatant.GetFirstName] did an Monkey move, and it was over. Although I was defeated, I saw [other_combatant.GetFirstName] stumble away from me, grasping [other_combatant.GetHerHis] [other_combatant.GetBodyPartInjured].

The match between [other_combatant.GetBestName] and I soon devolved into a grappling mess, with the chances of victory ebbing and flowing. After I caught [other_combatant.GetFirstName] off-guard, I had my blow returned to be tenfold.

My defensive strategy seemed to be working against [other_combatant.GetBestName]'s aggressive style, until I left myself wide open. Even though in my struggle I landed some blows, I was soon pinned and defeated.

I was in a defensive stance, locking eyes with [other_combatant.GetTitledFirstName]. The crowd began to whisper, as my opponent fidgeted awkwardly, [other_combatant.GetHerHis] face growing paler. I thought [other_combatant.GetSheHe] was about to faint, when the [other_combatant.GetManWoman] started running, away from me.
Still shivering, I cannot explain what happened. When it all came down to it, my legs gave way and I simply... I fled the match! I am such a coward! Why did I ever agree to this in the first place?
Just as I [other_combatant.GetWrestlingInjuringBlow], [other_combatant.GetTitledFirstName] manages to [Root.GetWrestlingInjuringBlowOnMe]. However, the crowd is chanting MY name!

My [GetBodyPartInjured] hurts, but it somehow doesn't seem as bad as what my opponent is suffering. Hail, [Root.GetSocietyRank]!

It has come to our attention that you have not been training in the recent months. To be a successful master, you must be in prime fitness at all times. Go to one of our training stations to get yourself in shape!

Signed, [From.GetTitledFirstName].

Arriving at my local training center, I am met with the sight of men and women, some of them my brothers and sisters in a Martial Arts School. All I hope is that I do not do anything stupid in front of them.
I just have to focus on my regimen.
Over the next few days, you will train to reach the standards of [Root.Society.GetTitledGrandMasterName].
Partway into my training regimen, as I am pressing a particularly heavy set of weights, my hand suddenly slips, causing my other arm to contort in a way it should not have.
As I was lifting a heavy set of weights, one of my legs gives way. The next few second feel like hours as I witness my leg flop awkwardly.
AHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHH
Your skills do not improve after this session.
After a few days of graceless exercise and the burn of stares from more experienced people, I have finally completed my mandated training regimen.
I... don't feel much stronger.
Your skills barely improve.
You suffer a slight injury
Several days of workout later, and I feel as if I am finally getting somewhere with this exercise stuff!
I feel great!
Your skills improve.
After finishing the last of my reps, I instantly feel a change. Working out is starting to become easy!
I could go for a couple more rounds of this stuff.
Wrapping up the last of my workouts, it feels easier and easier to do this stuff after each exercise I go through.
Absolute lightwork!
Your skills greatly improve.

Hail, [Root.GetSocietyRank] [Root.GetFirstName]
We are pleased with your progress. During the time you spent training you have taken a great steps in improving yourself within the ring. Hereby I declare your mission completed.

Signed, [From.GetSocietyRank] [From.GetFirstName].
You honor me, [From.GetSocietyRank].

To [Root.GetSocietyRank] [Root.GetFirstName]
I have heard some disturbing tales regarding your time at the gym, [Root.GetSocietyRank]. I fear that you are not yet ready for the training I expected of you. We will revisit this mission at a later date, but for the time being, I must consider this a failure.

Signed, [From.GetSocietyRank] [From.GetFirstName]
I have failed you, [From.GetSocietyRank]
After months of regularly working out, I am starting to feel... stronger...
Huzzah!

Hail, [Root.GetSocietyRank]!

As a [Root.GetSocietyRank], it is your duty to partake in the tradition in making a persona. Go, and choose to be either a Rudo or a Tecnico!

Signed, [From.GetTitledFirstName].
Now that I am a [Root.GetSocietyRank], I must choose a master persona in accordance to the ancient rules of Martial Arts.
I shall become a nameless master, defender of the good.
Become a nameless master, the heroes of Martial Arts.
I shall become a rival, defeater of the good.
Become a rival, the villains of Martial Arts.

Hail, [Root.GetSocietyRank]!

We are pleased that you have chosen to honor the traditions of Martial Arts! Now you are *truly* a master!

Signed, [From.GetSocietyRank] [From.GetFirstName].
You honor me [From.GetSocietyRank]
Now that I am properly acquainted with the way of Martial Arts, I should choose a lucha style.
I shall be the noble Monkey.
Become that of Sun Wukong, the proudest of martial master.
I shall be the voracious tiger.
Become a Tiger, a style that values attack over all else.
I shall be the crafty snake.
Become a Snake, which prioritizes dodges, grapples, and swift attacks.
After being in a Martial Arts School for a while, I am feeling things that I never had before. Being so... close to people my sex just gets to me in a way it never did before.
I can't deny these feelings!

After adopting a nameless master persona, the attributes of a nameless master are beginning to seep into my personal life. I am now realizing that I am nicer than I was before, and I find that my vassals can notice the change as well.
If it makes my vassals happy, I am all for this!

After adopting a rival persona, the traits normally attributed to them have begun to bleed into everyday life. I find myself flying into blind rages when a vassal disagrees with me and being all around ruder than I was before.
If my vassals don't like it they can GET OUT.
